text: Holy Cross Cemetery is a cemetery in North Arlington, New Jersey, United States. Since its establishment in 1915, it has buried over 250,000 people. The cemetery operates under the supervision of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Newark. Category:Buildings and structures in New Jersey Category:1915 establishments in the United States Category:Cemeteries in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in New Jersey
title: Holy Cross Cemetery, North Arlington
